member.name: T:Cosmos.I18N.Core.I18NIdentityCodeAttribute
member.summary: Attribute of cosmos i18n identity core

member.name: M:Cosmos.I18N.Languages.ILanguageTag.GetLanguage
member.summary: Returns the mandatory 2 character language subtag.
member.returns: A string describing a language subtag, or null if no such subtag present (indicating a null or error instance).

member.name: M:Cosmos.I18N.Languages.ILanguageTag.ToString
member.returns: A string describing the full language tag or "" if null or error instance.

member.name: M:Cosmos.I18N.Languages.ILanguageTag.GetExtlang
member.summary: Returns the optional 3 character extlang subtag.
member.returns: A string describing a extlang subtag, or null if no such subtag present.

member.name: M:Cosmos.I18N.Languages.ILanguageTag.GetScript
member.summary: Returns the optional 4 character script subtag.
member.returns: A string describing a script subtag, or null if no such subtag present.

member.name: M:Cosmos.I18N.Languages.ILanguageTag.GetRegion
member.summary: Returns the optional 2 or 3 character region subtag.
member.returns: A string describing a region subtag, or null if no such subtag present.

member.name: M:Cosmos.I18N.Languages.ILanguageTag.GetVariant
member.summary: Returns zero or more optional variant subtags.
member.returns: An array of strings describing the variant subtags, or null if no such subtag present.

member.name: M:Cosmos.I18N.Languages.ILanguageTag.GetExtension
member.returns: A string describing an extension subtag, or null if no such subtag present.

member.name: M:Cosmos.I18N.Languages.ILanguageTag.GetPrivateuse
member.returns: A string describing a privateuse subtag, or null if no such subtag present.

member.name: M:Cosmos.I18N.Languages.ILanguageTag.GetParent
member.summary: Returns an object representing any logical parent of the tag.
member.returns: Parent object or null if no parent.

member.name: M:Cosmos.I18N.Languages.ILanguageTag.GetMaxParents
member.summary: Returns the maximum number of parents possible. This is really a static value provided by the underlying impl.

member.name: M:Cosmos.I18N.Languages.ILanguageTag.GetCultureInfo
member.summary: Corresponding CultureInfo instance, or null if the langtag is unsupported on this system.

member.name: M:Cosmos.I18N.Languages.ILanguageTag.GetNativeNameTitleCase
member.summary: If the system supports a cultureinfo object for the language, this is the native name of the language suitable for user display, otherwise it is the language tag string.
